etymology.interpretation: Shelter under a roof evokes the idea of something settled or established, while 正 provides the sound and hints at correctness or alignment. The combination suggests fixing or deciding so that matters are set in place and certain.

examples.chinese: 我们定了周末见面的时间(我們定了週末見面的時間)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen dìng le zhōumò jiànmiàn de shíjiān.
examples.english: We set the time to meet on the weekend.

examples.chinese: 价格已经定下来了(價格已經定下來了)。
examples.english: The price has already been set.

examples.chinese: 他一定能按时到(他一定能按時到)。
examples.english: He will certainly arrive on time.
